---
layout: cheatsheet
tags: pdf epub cbr cbz comic reader
logo: data:image/svg+xml;base64,
section:
  - name: Keyboard control
    shortcuts:
      Switch dual mode (two pages view): <kbd>SHIFT</kbd>+<kbd>D</kbd>
      Odd/Even page in dual mode: <kbd>D</kbd>
      Next / Previous page: <kbd>SHIFT</kbd>+<kbd>J</kbd> / <kbd>SHIFT</kbd>+<kbd>K</kbd>
      Chapter list: <kbd>TAB</kbd>
      Go to first page: <kbd>G</kbd><kbd>G</kbd>
      Go to page 59: <kbd>5</kbd><kbd>9</kbd><kbd>G</kbd><kbd>G</kbd>
      Highlight links: <kbd>F</kbd>
      Search text: <kbd>/</kbd>
      Info: ":info"
---
